mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `JC_MOVIE_SCHEDULE` SET schedule_theater_no=#{schedule_theater_no}, schedule_screen_no=#{schedule_screen_no}, schedule_movie_no=#{schedule_movie_no}, schedule_date=#{schedule_date}, schedule_start_time=#{schedule_start_time}, schedule_end_time=#{schedule_end_time}, schedule_round_view=#{schedule_round_view};
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.theater_name, c.screen_name, d.movie_title, d.movie_poster, d.movie_grade, d.movie_genre FROM `JC_MOVIE_SCHEDULE` AS a JOIN `JC_THEATER` AS b ON a.schedule_theater_no = b.theater_no JOIN `JC_SCREEN` AS c ON a.schedule_theater_no = c.screen_theater_no AND a.schedule_screen_no = c.screen_no JOIN `JC_MOVIE` AS d ON a.schedule_movie_no= d.movie_no WHERE a.schedule_movie_no=#{ticket_movie_no} AND a.schedule_theater_no=#{seat_theater_no} AND a.schedule_screen_no=#{seat_screen_no} AND a.schedule_date=#{ticket_movie_date} AND a.schedule_round_view=#{ticket_round_view};
